name.japanese: シャッキーのぼったくりBAR

description: A bar located in Grove 13 of Sabaody Archipelago, owned and operated by Shakuyaku. Known for its extremely high prices (hence the name 'Rip-off Bar') and as an information hub. The bar serves as a safe haven and meeting place for pirates.

keyEvents.title: Shakky's Bar Discovery
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats arrive at the bar and meet Shakuyaku for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of this important location that serves as an information hub.

keyEvents.title: The Eleven Supernovas Revelation
keyEvents.description: Shakky reveals crucial information about the Eleven Supernovas to the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Major information dump that shapes the crew's understanding of their rivals.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh's Location Discussed
keyEvents.description: Shakky discusses Rayleigh's whereabouts and offers to help find him.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the search for the Dark King.

statusHistory.reason: Bar is operational and serving customers

name.japanese: シャボンディ諸島 - 無法地帯

description: A lawless area of Sabaody Archipelago where pirates and bounty hunters frequently clash. This zone is known for being outside the jurisdiction of normal law enforcement, making it a dangerous but necessary passage for pirates.

keyEvents.title: Bounty Hunters Defeated
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats bounty hunters in the lawless zone.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangers of this area.
